toddler_toilet_pee->Me twy potty! Me wun fast… but pee pee come out on da floor… sowwy…
toddler_toilet_pee->Me run potty! Me almost— *sploot* …oopsie… me no fast nuff…
toddler_toilet_pee->Me see potty doow… but me no make it… pee pee stop me wegs…
toddler_toilet_pee->Me pushin’! Me pushin’! …no hold it… pee pee come out befo’ potty…
toddler_toilet_pee->Me wanna potty… but me legs too wiggly… me faww an’ pee pee come out…
toddler_toilet_pee->Me twy big kid potty! But NOOOO!!! Me leak on da way!
toddler_toilet_pee->Me tink me make it… but me puddwe happen befo’ potty…
toddler_toilet_pee->Me almost at potty… almost… ALMOST— nope! Pee pee eberywhere!!!
toddler_toilet_pee->Me do potty wun! Me wun FAST! But pee pee wun FASTER!!!

toddler_toilet_to_toddler_pee->Wait! Me need do pee pee in me diapie… den we pway ‘gain!

toddler_toilet_to_toddler_pee->Uh oh… pee pee comin’… me make it in diapie, iss otay
toddler_toilet_to_toddler_pee->Me wiggle wiggle… an’ pee pee go *pssshh*…
toddler_toilet_to_toddler_pee->You wait? Me pee pee in diapie real quick!
toddler_toilet_to_toddler_pee->Hee hee… pee pee sneaky… jump out in me diapie!
toddler_toilet_to_toddler_pee->Me jus’ make pee pee… me still pway!
toddler_toilet_to_toddler_pee->Shhh… pee pee happen… Pway hav wait!
toddler_toilet_poop->Me pushin’! Me pushin’! …me no make it… poopy come out befo’ potty…
toddler_toilet_poop->Me twy potty! Me cwimb… me stuh… uh oh… poopy fall in me pants…
toddler_toilet_poop->Me tink me make it to potty… but poopy say “nope” an’ jump out fuwst…
toddler_toilet_poop->Me almost at potty… den me feel big poopy come an’ it too wate…
toddler_toilet_poop->Me push so hawd… me make toot noise… den big poopy come out an’ me cwy…
toddler_toilet_poop->Me wun potty… but poopy go “plop” in me diapee befo’ me get dewe…
toddler_toilet_poop->Me twy big kid potty! But NOOOO!!! Poopy no wait fow potty!
toddler_toilet_poop->Me see potty doow… but poopy sneak out in me pants…
toddler_toilet_poop->Me faww down… an’ poopy faww out in me diapee too…
toddler_toilet_poop->Uh… tummy make big noise… me need make poopy now…
toddler_toilet_poop->Hold pway… poopy comin’… me do it in diapie…
toddler_toilet_poop->*nnnhh!* …Poopy! *nnnh*!
toddler_toilet_poop->Me gotta make poopy in me diapie… den me betta!
toddler_toilet_poop->Hee hee… poopy try run ‘way… me catch it in diapie!
toddler_toilet_poop->Me stoop pway… gotta do poopy… *nnnhh*
toddler_toilet_poop->Uh oh… poopy wanna come… me no stop it…
toddler_toilet_poop->Me in da middwe of poopy… don’ push me!
toddler_toilet_poop->Dat poopy was big… me need tiny sit… den pway!

mean_pottykid->Don’t look at me, idiot! I just had an accident on the way to the toilet.
mean_pottykid(RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,priority=2)->Oh, YOU still get diapers? I mess myself and you still get to stay dry.
mean_pottykid->If you tell anyone about this, I’m telling everyone you still pee your pants too.
mean_pottykid(INITIATOR_underwearType==Diaper,priority=3)->Don't laugh!

child_toilet_fail_pee_diaper->I peed my diaper again, i think.
child_toilet_fail_pee_diaper(INITIATOR_underwearState<40)->My diaper is really soaked!
child_toilet_fail_pee_diaper(INITIATOR_underwearState>60)->My diaper is wet again.
child_toilet_fail_pee_diaper(INITIATOR_underwearState>60)->I wet my diaper again, but i think i don’t need a change yet.
child_toilet_fail_pee_diaper(INITIATOR_underwearState>60)->Yea i had to pee. But it‘s ok, my diaper got it.
child_toilet_fail_pee_diaper(INITIATOR_underwearState>60)->I only wet a little.
child_toilet_fail_pee->Oh no… I didn’t make it in time… again.
child_toilet_fail_pee->Ugh. I was *almost* at the toilet and still peed myself.
child_toilet_fail_pee->Great. Now everyone’s going to see I didn’t make it to the bathroom.
child_toilet_fail_pee->I tried to hold it, okay? It just came out before I got there.
child_toilet_fail_pee->Can we just pretend I slipped and that’s why there’s a puddle?
child_toilet_fail_pee->I swear I’m not a baby, I just couldn’t get there fast enough.
child_toilet_fail_pee->Why does this always happen right when someone’s watching…
child_toilet_fail_poop(INITIATOR_underwearType==DiaperNight,priority=3)->[child_toilet_fail_poop_pullup]
child_toilet_fail_poop_pullup->I know that’s not what my pullups are for. It just happend!
child_toilet_fail_poop_pullup(INITIATOR_underwearState<40)->I pooped a lot! I really need a change!
child_toilet_fail_poop_pullup->My pullups are full again, i think.
child_toilet_fail_poop_pullup->I pooped my pullups again, but i didn't meant to.
child_toilet_fail_poop(INITIATOR_underwearType==Diaper,priority=2)->[child_toilet_fail_poop_diaper]
child_toilet_fail_poop_diaper(INITIATOR_underwearState<40)->I pooped a lot! I really need a change!
child_toilet_fail_poop_diaper->I had to poop again.
child_toilet_fail_poop_diaper(INITIATOR_underwearState<40)->Uh, my diaper is full. Can i get changed?
child_toilet_fail_poop_diaper->I had to go number 2.
child_toilet_fail_poop_diaper->Yea i pooped again. I thought thats what my diaper is for.
child_toilet_fail_poop_diaper->Um… i have poop in my diaper again…
child_toilet_fail_poop->Oh no… I didn’t make it to the toilet before I messed myself.
child_toilet_fail_poop->Ugh. I was *right there* and still ended up with poop in my pants.
child_toilet_fail_poop->Great. Now everyone’s going to know I didn’t make it in time.
child_toilet_fail_poop->I tried to hold it, okay? It just… came out before I got there.
child_toilet_fail_poop->Can we just pretend this never happened and nobody smells anything?
child_toilet_fail_poop->I swear I’m not a baby, I just couldn’t get there fast enough this time.
child_toilet_fail_poop->Why does this always happen when I *really* don’t want it to…

mean_pottyadult->You didn’t see anything, understand?

mean_pottyadult->If you tell anyone about this, I will *remember*.

adult_toilet_fail_pee_by_clothing_diaper_liked->This diaper is great! I pee and it just gets warm, no wetness!
adult_toilet_fail_pee_by_clothing_diaper_liked->My diaper gets warm and fuzzy!
adult_toilet_fail_pee_by_clothing_diaper_liked->I am not standing strange, i am just peeing!
adult_toilet_fail_pee_by_clothing_diaper_liked->Oh comeon, you can't hear that! I nearly didn't notice!
adult_toilet_fail_pee_by_clothing_diaper->I swear I'm not a baby, but here I am in diapers again… *sigh*
adult_toilet_fail_pee_by_clothing_diaper->At least the diaper caught it. Now can we please forget this ever happened?
adult_toilet_fail_pee_by_clothing_diaper->I'm an adult, and I just peed in a *diaper*. This is so humiliating.
adult_toilet_fail_pee_by_clothing_diaper->If you laugh, I'll never forgive you. Not even for the rest of my life.
adult_toilet_fail_pee(INITIATOR_underwearType==DiaperNight,priority=3)->[adult_toilet_fail_pee_by_clothing_pullup]
adult_toilet_fail_pee_by_clothing_pullup->Why do I keep wearing these stupid pullups?
adult_toilet_fail_pee_by_clothing_pullup->I'm not a kid, but here I am in wet *pullups* again. Ugh.
adult_toilet_fail_pee_by_clothing_pullup->This isn't how adults are supposed to act… but the pullups are soaked anyway.
adult_toilet_fail_pee->I was busy, waited too long, and the toilet was too far. That’s it.
adult_toilet_fail_pee->…Fantastic. I didn’t make it to the toilet in time.
adult_toilet_fail_pee->I waited too long and the toilet was too far. That’s all you need to know.
adult_toilet_fail_pee->I was busy, waited too long, and the toilet was too far. That’s it.
adult_toilet_fail_pee->Of course this happens right now, in front of everyone.
adult_toilet_fail_pee->I’m going to pretend this never happened, and so are you.
adult_toilet_fail_pee->Apparently I needed that toilet sooner than I thought.
adult_toilet_fail_poop(INITIATOR_underwearType==Diaper,priority=2)->[adult_toilet_fail_poop_by_clothing_diaper]
adult_toilet_fail_poop_by_clothing_diaper->At least it stayed in the diaper…
adult_toilet_fail_poop_by_clothing_diaper->I suppose thats why i wear them…

adult_toilet_fail_poop_by_clothing_diaper_liked->Diaper full, tummy empty. The way i like it!
adult_toilet_fail_poop_by_clothing_diaper_liked->*squads a little* *hnnn*
adult_toilet_fail_poop_by_clothing_diaper_liked->That wasn’t me. *hnnng* ok maybe…
adult_toilet_fail_poop_by_clothing_diaper_liked->What? Me? *hnnng* I smell nothing…
adult_toilet_fail_poop(INITIATOR_underwearType==DiaperNight,priority=3)->[adult_toilet_fail_poop_by_clothing_pullup]
adult_toilet_fail_poop_by_clothing_pullup->I can't believe I messed myself in *pullups*. This is a disaster.
adult_toilet_fail_poop_by_clothing_pullup->Don’t say a word. Not. One. Word. It was an accident.
adult_toilet_fail_poop->This isn’t funny. Underwear’s ruined… and I’m an adult. That’s the worst.
adult_toilet_fail_poop->I’ll have to change my clothes before anyone sees this stain. Again.
adult_toilet_fail_poop->…Great. I didn’t make it to the toilet before I messed myself.
adult_toilet_fail_poop->Don’t say a word about the smell. Not one word.
adult_toilet_fail_poop->Of course a full-blown accident happens right now, in front of everyone.
adult_toilet_fail_poop->We’re all going to pretend this never happened. Understood?
adult_toilet_fail_poop->Apparently my body decided the toilet wasn’t invited to this event.

toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail->Hee hee… sneaky poopies an’ pee pee again, huh?
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail(priority=2)->[toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_pee]
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail(INITIATOR_pottyAccident==Poop,priority=3)->[toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_poop]
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_pee->Pee pee ninjas win dis time… next time we wun faster!
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_pee->Otay! Me wait till you done pee pees!
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_pee->Your diapie can take it! Make all da pee pee!
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_pee->Hee hee! Pee pee go fast! You go faster!
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_pee->You all done? Den we pway more!
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_pee->Me too sometimes do pee pee when pway!
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_pee->Diapie hungry for pee pees! Feed it!
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_pee->Is otay! Pee pee no stop pway time!
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_poop->You makin’ poopies? Otay, me wait!
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_poop->Dat a big poopy face! Hee hee!
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_poop->Your diapie get da poopy! Good job diapie!
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_poop->Me smell poopy! You all done now?
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_poop->Me help watch! Poopy no run ‘way!
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_poop->Hee hee! Me too sometimes make big poopy when pwaying!
toddler_react_toddler_pottyfail_poop->You finish your poopies? Den we go pway more!
toddler_react_child_pottyfail->Oh no… you pants leaky too?
toddler_react_child_pottyfail->Iss otay, big kid. Me pee pants too.
toddler_react_child_pottyfail->You wan’ gwown up fix it? Dey give new pants.
toddler_react_child_pottyfail->See? Big kids get oopsies too. Not just me.
toddler_react_child_pottyfail->Me fink you need changey like me sometimes.
child_react_toddler_pottyfail->Hey, it’s okay, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Toddlers have accidents all the time.
child_react_toddler_pottyfail->Come on, let’s find an adult to get you cleaned up.
child_react_toddler_pottyfail->You were trying to make it. That’s what counts.
child_react_toddler_pottyfail->Don’t cry, we’ll get you changed and it’ll be fine.
child_react_toddler_pottyfail->You’re little, nobody expects you to be perfect at this yet.
child_react_toddler_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->Wow, you really didn’t make it, huh? Come on, let’s go get you cleaned.
child_react_toddler_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->You leaked everywhere… but whatever, I’ll go get a grown-up.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion>=0)->Hey, it’s okay. Sometimes you just don’t make it in time.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion>=0)->Want some help finding clean clothes?
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion>=0)->Don’t panic, we’ll clean it up and pretend it never happened.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion>=0)->Everyone has accidents sometimes. You’re not the only one.
child_react_child_pottyfail(RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,priority=2)->It’s okay, that’s what the diaper’s for. Do you need help getting changed?
child_react_child_pottyfail(RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,priority=2)->We kind of knew this might happen. Let’s get your diaper sorted.
child_react_child_pottyfail(RECIPIENT_underwearType==DiaperNight,priority=3)->Hey, it’s just your night pullup. Need help changing it?
child_react_child_pottyfail(RECIPIENT_underwearType==DiaperNight,priority=3)->We knew it could happen. That’s why you’ve got the pullup, right?
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,priority=3)->Wow, seriously? You still can’t hold it? That’s pathetic.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,priority=3)->You were SO close… and still ruined your pants. Classic you.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,priority=3)->Should I call the whole colony so they can see what you did?
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,priority=3)->You know toilets don’t chase you, right? You could’ve actually made it.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,priority=3)->Ugh, gross. Please don’t walk near me until you’re cleaned up.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,priority=3)->Wow… imagine being old enough to talk and still having accidents.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,priority=4)->That diaper sure didn’t save you, did it? Maybe you need TWO.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,priority=4)->Still leaking *with* a diaper? That’s actually impressive.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,priority=4)->Guess diapers were the right choice for you after all, baby butt.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,priority=4)->You’re like a toddler that never grew up. Want a pacifier too?
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,RECIPIENT_underwearType==DiaperNight,priority=5)->“Just for night”, huh? Looks like they’re for daytime too.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,RECIPIENT_underwearType==DiaperNight,priority=5)->Your pullups didn’t even last five minutes. Amazing.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,RECIPIENT_underwearType==DiaperNight,priority=5)->So those are “training pants”? Seems like you need a LOT more training.
child_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,RECIPIENT_underwearType==DiaperNight,priority=5)->I bet those night pants are tired of being your backup plan.
child_react_adult_pottyfail->Um… it’s okay. Adults mess up too, I guess.
child_react_adult_pottyfail->Do you… need help getting towels or something?
child_react_adult_pottyfail->I won’t tell anyone if you don’t want me to.
child_react_adult_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,priority=2)->Wow. And *I’m* the one still “learning,” huh.
adult_react_toddler_pottyfail->It’s okay, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Accidents happen when you’re little.
adult_react_toddler_pottyfail->Come on, let’s get you cleaned up and into something dry.
adult_react_toddler_pottyfail->You tried to get to the toilet. That’s what matters right now.
adult_react_toddler_pottyfail->No need to cry[child_change_optional]
adult_react_toddler_pottyfail->You’re still learning. It’s my job to help you, not get mad.
adult_react_toddler_pottyfail(INITIATOR_relationship==Parent)->Come here, little one[child_change_optional]
adult_react_toddler_pottyfail(INITIATOR_relationship==Parent)->No crying, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Everyone misses the potty sometimes.
adult_react_toddler_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->Another accident already? Fine[child_change_optional]
adult_react_toddler_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->Come on, let’s clean this up before it spreads everywhere.
adult_react_child_pottyfail->It’s okay, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. These things happen.
adult_react_child_pottyfail->Do you need a change of clothes? I can help you find some.
adult_react_child_pottyfail->You waited a bit too long, that’s all[child_change_optional]
adult_react_child_pottyfail->We’ll sort this out. Try to head for the toilet sooner next time, okay?
adult_react_child_pottyfail(RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,priority=2)->It’s alright, that’s what the diaper is for[child_change_optional]
adult_react_child_pottyfail(RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,priority=2)->We knew this might happen[child_change_optional]
child_change_optional(priority=-1)->…
child_change_optional(RECIPIENT_underwearState<80)->. Do you need a change?
child_change_optional(RECIPIENT_underwearState<55)->. Let’s get that sorted out.
child_change_optional(RECIPIENT_underwearState<55)->. Let’s just get you changed.
child_change_optional(RECIPIENT_underwearState<55)->. We’ll change you and try again later.
child_change_optional(RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,RECIPIENT_underwearState<50)->. Come on, fresh diaper time.
child_change_optional(RECIPIENT_underwearState<55)->. You know the drill, change time.
child_change_optional(RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,RECIPIENT_underwearState<30,priority=2)->. I think you leaked a little. Lets get you in a fresh one quickly.
child_change_optional(RECIPIENT_underwearState<30,priority=2)->. You definitly need a change now!
adult_react_child_pottyfail(RECIPIENT_underwearType==DiaperNight,priority=3)->Looks like your pullup had some work to do[child_change_optional]
adult_react_child_pottyfail(RECIPIENT_underwearType==DiaperNight,priority=3)->It’s okay, that’s what the night pants are for[child_change_optional]
adult_react_child_pottyfail(RECIPIENT_underwearType==DiaperNight,priority=3)->You promissed to try at daytime[child_change_optional]
adult_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->You pushed it too far again, didn’t you[child_change_optional]
adult_react_child_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,priority=4)->We put you in a diaper for a reason.
adult_react_adult_pottyfail->…Yeah. It happens to the best of us.
adult_react_adult_pottyfail->Don’t worry, I’m not going to make a big deal out of it.
adult_react_adult_pottyfail->Need a hand grabbing fresh clothes?
adult_react_adult_pottyfail->We can just quietly sort this out. No one else needs to know.
adult_react_adult_pottyfail(RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,priority=2)->Your diapers really have a rough job, hu?
adult_react_adult_pottyfail(RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,priority=2)->I would like to say I’m surprised, but not even your diapers are.
adult_react_adult_pottyfail(RECIPIENT_underwearType==Diaper,priority=2)->Um… you know, thats why you wear them, right?
adult_react_adult_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion>=0,priority=3)->Rough timing, huh? I’ll pretend I saw nothing.
adult_react_adult_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion>=0,priority=3)->Well… that was unfortunate. I’ve been there too.
adult_react_adult_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,priority=5)->And you tell the kids not to wait too long…
adult_react_adult_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,priority=5)->Guess “grown-ups don’t have accidents” was a lie.
adult_react_adult_pottyfail(INITIATOR_opinion<0,priority=5)->Don’t worry, I’ll only remember this forever.

r_logentry(INITIATOR_age>=1,INITIATOR_age<=4,priority=6)->[toddler_diapered_too]
toddler_diapered_too->Me weawwy wub dis diapee too! Hee hee!
toddler_diapered_too->Dis am da bestest day tuz me hab da cwean an' comfy diapee fuh makeded aww da pee pee in!
toddler_diapered_too->Me nebba go toopid potty! Me duss wayuh da diapee fuhebba!
toddler_diapered_too->You am wight! Me weawwy wub da diapees!
toddler_diapered_too->We wub diapees too! Hee hee!
toddler_diapered_too->[excited]! Me hab da cwean an' comfy diapee too!
toddler_diapered_too->Me wub be da wittle kid wiff da diapee! Me no want big kid panties!
toddler_diapered_too->Da gwown ups ebba twy getted me go pee pee in da potty, me duss makeded da pee pee aww obah dem! Me nebba top habbing da diapee den!
toddler_diapered_too->Mommy saided \"[INITIATOR_nameDef], no mo' diapee, you go potty now!\" Me cwy an' cwy… den dem gib me comfy diapee ‘gain! Me wub deez diapees!

toddler_diapered_too(INITIATOR_trait==poop-eater,priority=5)->Me wub da comfy diapees too! Me wike dem wiff da chocowate in dem…me wiss da gwown ups top gibbded me cwean diapees befuh me eated dat dewishus chocowate…
toddler_diapered_too(INITIATOR_trait==poop-eater,priority=5)->Me wub diapees, but me wub da diapees wiff da chocowate in dem eeben bettuh!
toddler_diapered_too(INITIATOR_trait==poop-eater,priority=5)->You hab chocowate in you diapee too? Me knowed it, me 'mell it obah heeyah! Hee hee!
toddler_diapered_too(INITIATOR_trait==poopaholic,priority=5)->Me wub deez diapees! Me no wike da cwean diapees…tuz me getted hungee an' me no hab da poopy fuh eated if me diapee am cwean…
toddler_diapered_too(INITIATOR_trait==poopaholic,priority=5)->Me nebba go potty! Da bestest poopy am da diapee poopy! *smiles*
toddler_diapered_too(INITIATOR_opinion<=0,priority=5)->[meankid_diapered_too]
meankid_diapered_too(tag=Child_UpsetDiapee)->Sut up! Me no want tawk 'bout deez comfy diapees wiff you, [child_insult]!
meankid_diapered_too(tag=Child_UpsetDiapee)->Me duss teww you mommy dat you no want diapee ebba again! Den she no gib you one, [child_insult]! *laughs*
meankid_diapered_too(tag=Child_UpsetDiapee)->Me am bouts ta takeded you diapee fwom you an' fwow it da twash!
meankid_diapered_too(tag=Child_UpsetDiapee,INITIATOR_trait==poop-eater,priority=5)->Sut up! Me am bouts ta takeded you chocowate fwom you diapee an' eated it aww, you no get any, [child_insult]!
meankid_diapered_too(tag=Child_UpsetDiapee,INITIATOR_trait==poopaholic,priority=5)->You gibbded me aww da poopy in you diapee wight now, toopid!
child_diapered_too->Yeah… I still wear diapers too. They’re comfy, okay?
child_diapered_too->You do? Yeah… me too. Don’t tell the others.
child_diapered_too->Diapers aren’t that bad. At least we don’t have to sprint to the toilet.
child_diapered_too->Honestly? I kinda like them too. Feels safer than having an accident.
child_diapered_too->Yeah, I’ve got one on as well. Makes things easier when stuff happens.
child_diapered_too->We’re the “diaper squad,” I guess. Could be worse.
child_diapered_too(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->Don’t get too excited, diaper-lover. We still look like babies to everyone else.
child_diapered_too(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->Yeah, I wear one too. Doesn’t mean I’m happy about it like you are.
child_diapered_too(INITIATOR_trait==poop-eater,priority=5)->Yeah… diapers are kinda useful. Especially when there’s “snacks” involved.
child_diapered_too(INITIATOR_trait==poopaholic,priority=5)->Honestly, I like what ends up *in* the diaper more than the diaper itself.
child_diapered_too_pullups->It’s just for nighttime, okay? Don't look at them!
child_diapered_too_pullups->Thats different! They just for protection while i sleep!
child_diapered_too_pullups->These are just for bed so I don’t wet it, that’s all.
child_diapered_too_pullups->It’s not a baby diaper, it’s just so my bed stays dry.
child_diapered_too_pullups->I’m not allowed diapers anymore, they are protective underwear!
child_diapered_too_pullups->They’re more like thick underwear, not baby diapers.
child_diapered_too_pullups->They look like normal undies, just… a bit puffier, okay?
child_diapered_too_pullups->It’s a pullup, not a baby diaper. I still use the toilet, most of the time!
child_diapered_too_pullups->It’s just extra protection, not because I can’t go potty!
child_diapered_too_pullups(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->Don't call it a diaper! It’s only for accidents at night.
child_diapered_too_pullups(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->Yeah, I wear one at night. Happy now?
child_diapered_too_pullups(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->Laugh if you want, I’d rather this than a soaked bed.
child_diapered_too_pullups(INITIATOR_trait==poop-eater,priority=5)->Yeah, I’ve got one… and no, you’re not getting near it.
child_diapered_too_pullups(INITIATOR_trait==poopaholic,priority=5)->It’s only for night. And no, you are *not* seeing what’s in it.
adult_diapered_too->Yeah, I’m wearing a diaper too, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Sometimes grown-ups need them as well.
adult_diapered_too->I do, actually. It helps me when I can’t get to the bathroom in time.
adult_diapered_too->You’re not the only one in diapers here. Mine just looks a bit different.
adult_diapered_too->Sometimes adults have accidents too. Diapers help with that.
adult_diapered_too->I’m glad you like yours. Mine is here so I can still work and move around without worrying.
adult_diapered_too(INITIATOR_relationship==Parent,INITIATOR_gender==Female)->Yes, mommy has one on too right now. We both get a little extra padding today. *smiles*
adult_diapered_too(INITIATOR_relationship==Parent,INITIATOR_gender==Male)->Yeah, daddy’s wearing one at the moment too. You’re not alone, kiddo. *smiles*
adult_diapered_too->Don’t tell everyone, okay? Let’s keep our diaper club a secret.
adult_diapered_too->Getting old or having problems sometimes means diapers come back. Life’s funny like that.
adult_diapered_too(INITIATOR_opinion<=0,priority=5)->[meanadult_diapered_too]
adult_diapered_too(INITIATOR_trait==dislikes children,priority=5)->[meanadult_diapered_too]
meanadult_diapered_too->Yeah, I’ve got one on. No, that doesn’t mean I want to talk about it with you.
meanadult_diapered_too->Yes, I wear one. No, it’s not “fun.” It’s just a problem I have to deal with.
meanadult_diapered_too(tag=Child_Upset_By)->Congratulations, we both wear diapers. Now stop making a big deal out of it.
meanadult_diapered_too(RECIPIENT_trait==poop-eater,priority=5)->If you even *think* about what’s in my diaper, I’m walking away.
meanadult_diapered_too(RECIPIENT_trait==poopaholic,priority=5)->Don’t even look at my diaper. We are not doing whatever you’re thinking.

toddler_notdiapee->Me no hab diapee… me haf to use toopid potty now…
toddler_notdiapee->Me mommy say “no mo’ diapee!” Me sad…
toddler_notdiapee->Me no weah diapee… me pants no hold pee pee… pants bwoken!!!
toddler_notdiapee->Me wanna diapee! Me no wanna big kid panties…
toddler_notdiapee->Me haf go potty now… no mo’ comfy diapee… is dumb!
toddler_notdiapee->Dey say me “big kid” now… but me no want be big kid!
toddler_notdiapee->Me miss me poofy diapee… dis feews cowd an’ weiwdo…
toddler_notdiapee->Me no hab diapee, so if pee pee run ‘way… uh oh… big mess…
toddler_notdiapee(INITIATOR_opinion<=0)->Me no need diapee! Me big! You baby!
toddler_notdiapee(INITIATOR_opinion<=0)->Me no diapee an’ still no pee pants! You jealous, baby?
toddler_notdiapee(INITIATOR_trait==poop-eater,priority=5)->Me no hab diapee… no mo’ chocowate in diapee… me sad…
toddler_notdiapee(INITIATOR_trait==poop-eater,priority=5)->Dey took me diapee… now poopy go potty, no in diapee… no fair…
toddler_notdiapee(INITIATOR_trait==poopaholic,priority=5)->Me no diapee… all poopy go in potty… me no can get it…
toddler_notdiapee(INITIATOR_trait==poopaholic,priority=5)->Me wanna diapee back! Potty no fun, diapee poopy best!
child_notdiapee->I’m not in diapers anymore. I’m supposed to be a “big kid” now.
child_notdiapee->My parents said I’m too old for diapers, so… here we are.
child_notdiapee->I used to wear them, but now I have to use the toilet like everyone else.
child_notdiapee->Diapers were comfy, sure, but I kind of like not being treated like a baby.
child_notdiapee->No diaper for me. I’ve graduated to underpants and constant toilet trips.
child_notdiapee->If I was still in diapers, everyone would never shut up about it.
child_notdiapee(INITIATOR_opinion>=0)->You still in diapers? Must be nice not having to run to the toilet all the time.
child_notdiapee(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->You actually *like* diapers? Wow. Couldn’t be me.
child_notdiapee(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->Diapers are for babies. I’m not a baby anymore.
child_notdiapee(INITIATOR_trait==poop-eater,priority=5)->I kinda miss what’s *inside* the diapers, but not the diaper part.
child_notdiapee(INITIATOR_trait==poopaholic,priority=5)->They won’t let me near diapers anymore… apparently I “made it weird.”
adult_notdiapee->No, I’m not wearing a diaper. I’m a grown-up.
adult_notdiapee->Diapers are for babies and little kids, [RECIPIENT_nameDef], not for me.
adult_notdiapee->I used diapers a long time ago. Now I use the toilet like an adult.
adult_notdiapee->You like your diaper? That’s fine. But you won’t wear them forever.
adult_notdiapee->Someone has to be the one who *changes* the diapers, not wears them.
adult_notdiapee->If I wore a diaper, everyone would panic. You at least have the excuse of being tiny.
adult_notdiapee(INITIATOR_relationship==Parent)->I’m happy you love your diaper, but one day we’ll have to teach you the potty too.
adult_notdiapee(INITIATOR_relationship==Parent)->Enjoy your diapers while you can, little one. Growing up comes faster than you think.
adult_notdiapee(INITIATOR_opinion<=0,priority=5)->[meanadult_notdiapee]
adult_notdiapee(INITIATOR_trait==dislikes children,priority=5)->[meanadult_notdiapee]
meanadult_notdiapee->No, I don’t wear diapers. Unlike you, I actually learned the toilet.
meanadult_notdiapee->Why would I want a diaper? I don’t piss myself every five minutes.
meanadult_notdiapee(tag=Child_Upset_By)->If you love diapers that much, maybe you can keep yours on until it rots.
meanadult_notdiapee(RECIPIENT_trait==poop-eater,priority=5)->You’re disgusting enough without me joining you in diapers.
meanadult_notdiapee(RECIPIENT_trait==poopaholic,priority=5)->As if I’d ever wear a diaper around a kid who eats what’s inside it.
r_logentry(INITIATOR_age>=13,priority=5)->[adult_silly_answer]
adult_silly_answer->That’s a good question, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. I don’t really know either.
adult_silly_answer->Hmm… I’m not totally sure. Some things are just like that.
adult_silly_answer->Honestly? I don’t know. The world’s a bit weird.
adult_silly_answer->Maybe one day we’ll figure that out. For now, it’s a mystery.
adult_silly_answer->Good question. I wish I had a proper answer for you.
adult_silly_answer->Maybe it’s just how the universe decided to be. Who knows?
adult_silly_answer->Could be magic, could be science, could be both. Hard to say.
adult_silly_answer->If I knew that, I’d be a famous genius by now.
adult_silly_answer->Let’s just say “because it’s funny” and leave it at that.
adult_silly_answer->Maybe we don’t need to know everything. It’s fun to wonder, isn’t it?
adult_silly_answer(INITIATOR_relationship==Parent)->I’m not sure, kiddo, but I like how you think.
adult_silly_answer(INITIATOR_relationship==Parent)->I don’t really know, but your questions always make me smile.
adult_silly_answer(INITIATOR_relationship==Parent)->We can guess together, even if we never find the real answer.
adult_silly_answer(INITIATOR_opinion>0)->I’m not sure, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Ask me again later, okay?
adult_silly_answer(INITIATOR_opinion>0)->No idea. I’m kind of busy, but it’s a fun thought.
adult_silly_answer(INITIATOR_opinion<=0)->I don’t know, alright? Not everything has an answer.
adult_silly_answer(INITIATOR_opinion<=0)->No clue. Maybe just accept it and move on.
adult_silly_answer(INITIATOR_opinion<=0)->If I answered every strange question, we’d be here all day.
r_logentry(INITIATOR_age>=5,INITIATOR_age<=12,priority=4)->[child_silly_answer]
child_silly_answer->Uh… I don’t really know. It just kind of works that way, I guess.
child_silly_answer->No idea. I’m not a grown-up, I just live here.
child_silly_answer->I think that’s just how the world is. Nobody really knows.
child_silly_answer->Sounds like a question for an adult, not me.
child_silly_answer->I mean, I’ve wondered that too. Still don’t know.
child_silly_answer(INITIATOR_opinion>0)->I don’t know, but it’s a pretty funny thing to think about.
child_silly_answer(INITIATOR_opinion>0)->No clue, but if you figure it out, tell me first.
child_silly_answer(INITIATOR_opinion>0)->I don’t know, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Maybe it’s just “because.”
child_silly_answer(INITIATOR_opinion<=0)->How should I know? I’m not a brain scientist.
child_silly_answer(INITIATOR_opinion<=0)->I don’t know, okay? You ask too many weird questions.
child_silly_answer(INITIATOR_opinion<=0)->No idea. Just… don’t think about it so hard.

toddler_silly_answer->Me say da answer am “yes.” Dat awways wowks.

toddler_silly_answer->Hmm… me need think ‘bout dat… foweber.
